kit.leader_skill: "Final Trump Card" or "Earthlings" Category Ki +3 and HP, ATK & DEF +200%

super_attack.name: Dodon Ray
super_attack.effect: Raises ATK for 1 turn,; causes colossal damage to enemy; and lowers ATK & DEF

ultra_super_attack.name: Open Ball Fist
ultra_super_attack.effect: Greatly raises ATK,; causes mega-colossal damage to enemy; and lowers ATK & DEF

passive_skill.name: Crane School's Backbone
passive_skill.effect: Activates the Entrance Animation upon the character's entry: (Once) Ki +4 to 8 randomly at the start of turn for 10 turns; (Once) Ki +2 and ATK & DEF 250% up; (Once) All allies' DEF 30% up for 2 turns; Before receiving an attack within the turn: Damage reduction rate 75% up; After receiving an attack as the 1st attacker in a turn: DEF 400% up; Damage reduction rate 30% up; Ki +3, ATK 100% up, DEF 200% up and damage reduction rate 20% up for 3 turns; As the 2nd or 3rd attacker in a turn: ATK 100% up, DEF 200% up and attacks are effective against all Types for 4 turns; ATK 400% up, DEF 200% up and great chance of evading enemy's attack when attacking; When receiving a Ki Blast Super Attack: High chance of nullifying it and countering with tremendous power; Nullifies it and counters with tremendous power if there is a "Kamehameha" Category enemy

active_skill.name: Tri-Beam
active_skill.effect: Causes ultimate damage to enemy; Ki +24 for 1 turn
active_skill.activation_conditions: Can be activated when there is a "Turtle School" or "Kamehameha" Category enemy Or starting from the 5th turn from the start of battle (once only)
